Projects

Big Data based Terrorism Information Detection Solution Research

2017.5 - Present, International Software School, Wuhan Univerisity

• Researched on machine learning methods to build models of terrorism related behavior on the internet

HDFS User Activity Log Analysis Data Visualization and Abnormality Detection

2017.3 - 2017. 5, Spatial Big Data Visualization Lab, Wuhan Univerisity

• Researched on HDFS user activity logs data mining and visualization
• Developed a React web application for visualizing log data and help HDFS administrator detect abnormal activities with Node.js, D3.js

HDFS resources Management Web Application

2015.12 - 2016.3 , Spatial Big Data Visualization Lab, Wuhan Univerisity

• Developed HDFS file manager web application with java at back-end and JavaScript, html, CSS JQuery at front-end
• Implemented HDFS APIs for the easy manipulation of copying, pasting, deleting, moving and changing privilege of files in HDFS as part of Hadoop MongoDB administration App

RFID Middleware

2015.6 - 2015. 12, Big Data and Cloud Computing Lab, Wuhan Univerisity

• Developed RFID tag reader management software with Java to manipulating the connection and reading process of Impinj reader with LLRP protocol, used for future algorithms experiment

RFID Anti-collision Simulation Research

2015.4 - 2015. 6, Big Data and Cloud Computing Lab, Wuhan Univerisity

• Conducted research on RFID anti-collision Algorithm, such as Aloha, tree based and slotted frame algorithms
